lead_paragraph: LEAD: YET another trend is swelling up from California, and this one is unlikely to make lawmakers anywhere very happy. Since it has become almost impossible to throw the rascals out, a movement is gathering steam in California and elsewhere to shut them out - by limiting the time any legislator can hold the same office.

headline.main: Voters Propose to Put a Lid on Their Representatives
